scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @vjcspy/g-base build:watch" "yarn workspace @vjcspy/g-int-sap build:watch" "yarn workspace @vjcspy/g-app build:watch" "yarn workspace @vjcspy/g-app start:dev"
scripts.migrate: yarn workspace @vjcspy/g-app build && yarn workspace @vjcspy/g-app migrate
scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('Must be installed with Yarn')"
